entry.title: Derby Originals Heavy Duty Adjustable 30” Nylon Hanging Bucket Straps for Water and Feed Buckets - Available in Four Fun Patterns
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stall and Arena
Price: 4.95

Derby Originals line of adjustable bucket straps are made from a high-quality nylon web material that is 1” wide and adjustable from 10” to 30” to allow you to use them for a wide variety of applications. These bucket straps also have stainless steel hardware that is designed for indoor or outdoor use. We offer bucket straps in a wide variety of options, including: Blue Chevron, Grey Floral, Paisley, Aztec, Black, Charcoal, Coral, Pink, Red, Brown, Olive Green, Hurricane Blue, Royal Blue, Navy Blue, Light Purple, and Purple.

  • DURABLE DESIGN - our bucket straps are made from a high-quality nylon web material that is 1” wide. Our bucket straps also have stainless steel hardware that is designed for indoor or outdoor use.
  • IDEAL FOR MANY APPLICATIONS - these sturdy bucket straps were designed to be used indoors or outdoors and are ideal for use on gates, fence posts, inside stalls and barns, out in the pasture, or even in your horse trailer.
  • ADJUSTABLE FROM 10 TO 30” - these 1” wide nylon bucket straps can be adjusted anywhere from approx. 10” to 30” to allow you to use them for a wide variety of applications.
  • HIGH QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL HARDWARE - these bucket straps utilize stainless steel hardware to ensure they are long lasting in outdoor conditions and do not rust.
  • AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE COLORS - our bucket straps are available in a wide variety of colors, including: Black, Charcoal, Coral, Pink, Red, Brown, Olive Green, Hurricane Blue, Royal Blue, Navy Blue, Light Purple, and Purple.

entry.title: Derby Originals Heavy Duty Equestrian Bucket Hook Hanger - Lot of 4
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stable Hardware
Price: 9.95

Durable design bucket hook mounts easily and has a tab to help prevent the bucket from being knocked off the hook. Made from steel for long-lasting durability.
  • DURABILITY: This bucket hook will not disappoint. The hook is designed to withstand a lot of weight and with the heavy-duty, the metal will prevent bending or breaking. The ring helps prevent the bucket from being knocked off if your horse is playful with his or her's water bucket. 
  • EASY TO INSTALL: Simply take the two provided screws and choose your destination you desire and screw in. Please make sure the hook is properly secure. They can be installed either outdoors or indoors and can be easily removed and reused. 
  • PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: each bucket hook wall mount includes a set of screws. 
  • SIZE: 5 3/8" X 1" X 1/2"

entry.title: Derby Collapsible Nylon Water Buckets For Trail Riding
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Stall and Arena
Price: 9.95

Keep your cool and lighten your load. This collapsible water bucket makes watering your horse on the go easier. Perfect for long trail rides, camping, and everyday barn use.




  • Durable waterproof nylon construction
  • Collapsible to 1.5" tall
  • 10.5" tall when extended
  • 10" diameter ensures your horse can drink to the last drop

entry.title: Collapsible Canvas Water Bucket by Derby Originals
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Horse Feed Bags
Price: 9.95

Keep your horse hydrated on the go. Collapsible and easy to fill. Ready for the trails or the show ring.

  • Heavy duty canvas water bag
  • Conveniently folds to fit the smallest trail bags and luggage
  • Perfect when traveling to shows and other riding events
  • 27 inch circumference; 12 inch depth
